# sdwan_policy_object_feature_profile (Data Source)

This data source can read the Policy Object Feature Profile .

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sdwan_policy_object_feature_profile" "example" {
  id = "f6b2c44c-693c-4763-b010-895aa3d236bd"
}
```
